name: twin-backend
description: AI Digital Twin Backend - Node.js + TypeScript

scripts.build:lambda: npm run build && mkdir -p dist/data && cp -r data/* dist/data/ && cd dist && zip -r ../lambda-deployment.zip .
scripts.build:lambda:win: npm run build && xcopy /E /I /Y data dist\data && powershell Compress-Archive -Path dist\* -DestinationPath lambda-deployment.zip -Force
